name: The terror from the shadows
description:
NOTE: when the game ends or if you die then just refresh the page or if you downloaded the game just close and open it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project is a first generation copy brought to you by VHS collection dev copyright (well it isnt copyrighted) 1982

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Watch out or the monster from the shadows will get your ass.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

The terror from the shadows is a pixelated 3d/2.5d game where you play as a serial killer who killed over 10 victims. ... just one of them came back to hunt you.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

You will need to find the key that you left somewere in the basement.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controles:

W, A - Back/ Foward

A, D - Turn camera Left/ Right

SPACE - Run (Usefull)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Big thanks to 

Sashafirefly

for raycasting help.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

And one more thing...

The compas is your best friend...
